item.title: Intel® VTune™ Profiler: Basic Installation
item.description:
Step 1: Download the VTune Profiler Get the desired version from the official page HERE I used the version 2020.update2. The next steps can be followed as per the guide provided HERE. Open the PDF version for your OS. I am using Ubuntu 18.04.4 LTS. I will mention the steps I followed from it.
Step 2: Install Prerequisites On Ubuntu* or Debian*, install the following libraries: sudo apt-get install libgtk-3-0 libasound2 libxss1 libnss3 On Red Hat* Enterprise Linux or CentOS*, install the following libraries:
